text: Houston Faith Bible Institute has a new
exciting summer course elective Healing
The Sick this course is designed to
equip Believers in ministering healing
and deliverance to the sick and
demonized every Christian should fulfill
the commission of Jesus of being a
witness with power and every Christian
should work miracles in the name of
their lord now you can the class is for
everyone who wants to understand the
power of God how to do the works of
Jesus and how to pray more effectively
for the people in your life
five powerful classes start on Monday
July 1st the school is also online go to
hfbi chorg and register now for our July
summer course elective Healing The
Sick Houston Faith Bible Institute the
school for dynamic Bible training and
spirit filled Faith advancement take
your next Faith Step at hfbi
